definition: Fengrun district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
Fengrun district of Tangshan city 唐山市[Tang2 shan1 shi4], Hebei

sentences.english: A rich straw-yellow color with gold reflections.
sentences.chinese: 丰润的稻黄色酒体掩映出金色光芒。

sentences.english: The sangiovese grapes are the basis for this rich red wine.
sentences.chinese: 桑吉斯是酿制这款丰润的红葡萄酒的基本葡萄品种。

sentences.english: Full , smooth and rich in flavors.
sentences.chinese: 口感丰润饱满，口味十分丰富。

sentences.english: It's rich in color and texture.
Zhu shopkeeper Tangshan rich, people, ancestors to make tofu business.
sentences.chinese: 朱掌柜是唐山丰润人，祖上就做豆腐生意。

sentences.english: No. 436, Caoxueqin West Avenue, Fengrun District, Tangshan City, Hebei Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 中国，河北，唐山市，丰润区曹雪芹西道436号。

sentences.english: His skin is as the most fine gold. His cheeks are as a bed of spices!
sentences.chinese: 他的皮肤如黄金般光辉，他的双颊更是丰润。

sentences.english: A luxuriant tan bespeaks health and glamour.
sentences.chinese: 丰润的棕色皮肤是健康和魅力的标志。

sentences.english: Opening-Up Affairs Office of Fengrun District is responsible for explaining the policies .
sentences.chinese: 本办法由丰润区人民政府开放办公室负责解释。

sentences.english: When embrace her, I can feel her plump buttock .
sentences.chinese: 当拥抱她的时候，我可以感觉到她丰润的臀部。
